summary: Ethereum’s mainnet Merge with the proof-of-stake Beacon Chain should happen sometime next month.
title: Ethereum’s Third and Final Testnet Merge Goes Live on Goerli
content: The third and final test environment network (testnet) merge before the Ethereum blockchain makes its long-awaited move to proof-of-stake from proof-of-work has successfully been completed.
Read more: Goerli Is Coming: Ethereum’s Last Rehearsal Before the Merge
Read more: Ethereum After the Merge: What Comes Next?
